au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.name: Long_16moffset100910
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Drive detector to long position driveDet(16000,300) # Drive guide to ga driveGuide(guideConfig.ga) # Drive entrance aperture to 150 (for guide ga) driveEntRotAp(150) # Select beam stop selBs(1)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(40, 100) # Drive attenuator to 240 driveAtt(240)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(40, 0) driveBsz(265)
